isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 9200 9300 9400 MODELS BUILT AFTER JANUARY 1, 1995 - ELECTRONIC ENGINE CONTROLS - CUMMINS CELECT - 1992-1993 - TROUBLESHOOTING - HELLA RELAY

svcproc.title: HELLA RELAY
svcproc.para: International circuits use suppressedHella relays (1672537C1) for controlling power to load devices ( Figure 5.06). The suppression feature (a resistor circuit parallel to the relay coil) prevents voltage spikes from damaging electronic components in the vehicle. These relays must be replaced with the correct International part.The part number is embossed on the relay. There is also a circuit diagram of the relay located on the relay body. The terminals are numbered on the relay in the same manner as in the circuit diagrams.

figure.caption: Figure 5.06 - Relay Function And Wiring Guide
